home.aboutCompanyDescription: DOQI company was founded in 1992 in Kosovo under extremely difficult circumstances. Despite the destruction of the 1998-1999 war, with dedication and professionalism, we rebuilt by focusing on furniture raw materials. In 2011 we created the StarFlex brand for mattresses, and in 2013 we launched cutting, edging, and CNC services, becoming a market leader and an example of domestic success.
home.missionDescription: Our mission is to develop the company by offering quality products and services in the furniture sector, with a wide range of raw materials for kitchens, bedrooms, sofas, doors, and furniture for offices and hotels. We offer high-quality StarFlex mattresses and collaborate with the most renowned brands from Germany, Turkey, Italy, Spain, and Greece.
home.visionDescription: DOQI aims to be the reference point in Europe for the supply of furniture raw materials and the production of StarFlex mattresses. Our vision is to build a sustainable value chain that combines quality, innovation, and respect for the environment, leading with responsibility and passion in European markets.
home.stat2Description: Unique products to meet every construction and design need

about.title: About DoqiSHPK
about.subtitle: Learn more about our company and mission
about.description: DoqiSHPK is committed to delivering exceptional furniture and mattress solutions that enhance the comfort and style of your living spaces

hero.title: About DoqiSHPK
hero.subtitle: Crafting Excellence in Furniture & Mattresses Since Our Foundation

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to develop and grow our company by offering quality products and services in the field of furniture, with a wide range of raw materials for the production of kitchens, bedrooms, sofas, doors, office furniture, hotels, and indoor and outdoor environments. We also offer high-quality mattresses produced by our company and trade raw materials for local and international manufacturers. Our goal is to anticipate market needs by strategically positioning ourselves through partnerships with the world's most renowned brands from Germany, Turkey, Italy, Spain, Greece, and other countries, to offer unique and modern solutions. We continuously invest in our people, building a culture of collaboration, trust, and transparency with our clients, whom we consider long-term partners on the shared path towards sustainability and development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: DOQI aims to be the reference point in Europe for supplying raw materials for the furniture industry and mattress production through our StarFlex branch. Our vision is to build a sustainable value chain that combines quality, innovation, and respect for the environment, offering products that inspire comfort, functionality, and longevity. We aim to lead with responsibility and passion in the European markets where we operate, creating strong partnerships and building trust through the highest standards of performance and ethics. Supported by our core values – quality, reliability, innovation, and commitment to values – DOQI aspires to become a symbol of sustainable development in the furniture and mattress industry, positively impacting people's lives and the planet's future.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: DOQI Company was founded in 1992 in Kosovo, during an extremely difficult period under the Yugoslav regime, when working conditions were very harsh. During 1998-1999, war broke out, which brought the destruction of everything we had built with dedication over the years. However, the great desire to work, unwavering will, and faith in the future pushed us to start from scratch, in a new reality, with great emotional and spiritual challenges. We did not give up. Year after year, with dedication and professionalism, we managed to rebuild the company, initially focusing on selling raw materials for furniture production, a sector with great development needs in our country. Thanks to seriousness and correctness, we became a trusted partner both inside and outside Kosovo, offering excellent services and quality products. Seeing the growing demand for imported mattresses, in 2011 we decided to invest and start producing them domestically. Thus, we created the StarFlex brand, which became known in the local market and beyond, distinguished for quality, flexibility, and fast service. In addition to mattress production, our company has also become an important supplier of raw materials for this industry, positioning itself as a market leader and an example of local success. In 2013, we also started cutting, edge banding, and CNC technology services, offering our customers opportunities to grow their businesses. These services are offered at low cost, with a clear purpose: raising local capacities to provide services at the country level, contributing to reducing imports and the economic development of Kosovo. This is the story of a company born from sacrifice, grown from dedication, and strengthened by determination. DOQI remains living proof that success is not accidental, but the result of passionate work and unwavering faith in our vision.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on quality, using only the finest materials and employing rigorous quality control processes.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously invest in new technologies and design approaches to stay ahead of industry trends.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We listen, understand, and deliver solutions that exceed expectations.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to environmentally responsible practices in our manufacturing processes and material sourcing.

factory.title: State-of-the-Art Manufacturing
factory.description: Our modern production facility is equipped with advanced machinery and technology, enabling us to maintain consistent quality while meeting growing demand. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern manufacturing techniques to create products that stand the test of time.

team.title: Our Expert Team
team.description: Behind every DoqiSHPK product is a team of skilled craftsmen, designers, and quality specialists who share a passion for excellence. Our experienced professionals bring decades of combined expertise to ensure every product meets our exacting standards.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to You
commitment.description: We are dedicated to providing not just products, but complete solutions that enhance your living experience. From initial design concepts to final delivery, we ensure every aspect of our service reflects our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

partners.title: Our Trusted Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with industry-leading companies to deliver exceptional quality and innovation

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: We're always looking for talented individuals to join our growing team. Explore career opportunities at DoqiSHPK.

reviews.title: Trusted by Thousands of Happy Customers
reviews.subtitle: Customer Satisfaction

review1.name: Flutura S.
review1.comment: As a restaurant owner, durability and design are equally important. The HPL Compact panels we purchased from Doqi Shpk gave our space a modern look and can easily handle daily wear and tear. Customers often compliment the design — it was the right investment for our business.

review2.name: Burim L.
review2.comment: Working with Doqi has transformed how I approach commercial projects. Their extensive range of materials and professional consultation helped me deliver exceptional results to my clients. The quality speaks for itself.

review3.name: Drita B.
review3.comment: We furnished our entire hotel with materials from Doqi. The combination of durability, style, and competitive pricing made them our preferred partner. Our guests consistently praise the modern aesthetic.

review4.name: Faton H.
review4.comment: I purchased a StarFlex mattress and MDF boards for my home renovation. The quality exceeded my expectations! The team was professional, delivery was on time, and the prices were fair. Highly recommend!

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our website
terms.introduction: Welcome to Doçi Sh.p.k. ("we", "our", "us"). By accessing or using our website www.doqi-ks.com, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our website.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.content:
The website www.doqi-ks.com is owned and operated by Doçi Sh.p.k., a company registered in Kosovo.
Our website provides information about our products, services, and company activities.

useOfWebsite.title: Use of Website
useOfWebsite.content:
This website is intended for informational purposes only.
Users may browse our products and company information but may not copy, reproduce, or distribute any content from this website without written permission from Doçi Sh.p.k.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
All text, graphics, images, product designs, and other materials on this website are the intellectual property of Doçi Sh.p.k. or its licensors.
You may not use, copy, or reproduce these materials for commercial purposes without prior written consent.

accuracyOfInfo.title: Accuracy of Information
accuracyOfInfo.content:
We make reasonable efforts to ensure that all information displayed on our website is accurate and up to date.
However, Doçi Sh.p.k. does not guarantee that the information is free of errors or omissions and reserves the right to update or modify content at any time.

linksToOtherSites.title: Links to Other Websites
linksToOtherSites.content:
Our website may include links to external sites.
We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of those third-party websites.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: Doçi Sh.p.k. shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use this website.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to These Terms
changesToTerms.content:
We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms of Service at any time.
The updated version will always be available on this page with a revised date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at:
📧 info@doqi-ks.com

terms.questionsText: If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms of Service, we're here to help.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us
privacy.introduction: At Doçi Sh.p.k., we value your privacy and are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information in connection with our website www.doqi-ks.com.

infoWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoWeCollect.content:
We do not collect any personal data from visitors to our website.
The site is used solely to display information about our products and services.

cookiesAnalytics.title: Cookies and Analytics
cookiesAnalytics.content: Our website does not use cookies, tracking technologies, or analytics tools that collect identifiable user data.

linksToOtherSites.title: Links to Other Sites
linksToOtherSites.content:
Our website may contain links to other websites.
We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those external sites.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: Even though we do not collect data, we maintain technical safeguards to keep our website secure and to prevent unauthorized access.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
📧 info@doqi-ks.com

privacy.commitmentText: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of privacy and transparency. Your trust is important to us.
privacy.questionsText: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, feel free to reach out to us.
